recipes.name: Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Whisk in milk and egg until smooth.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook the other side.
Serve with syrup or toppings of choice.
